verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w I|strong="H0428"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* often \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w such|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w as|strong="H8085"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w*: \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w troublesome|strong="H5999"\w* \w comforters|strong="H5162"\w*.

\w Shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w windy|strong="H7307"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* no \w end|strong="H7093"\w*? \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H0176"\w* trouble \w to|strong="H1697"\w* thee \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w*?

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w could|strong="H1571"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w like|strong="H8478"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w would|strong="H3863"\w* God \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w were|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

I would \w comfort|strong="H5205"\w* \w you|strong="H6310"\w* also \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* would wag \w my|strong="H2820"\w* head over \w you|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w would|strong="H4100"\w* strengthen \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w would|strong="H4100"\w* \w move|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* lips, \w as|strong="H1980"\w* sparing \w you|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* what \w shall|strong="H5712"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w*? If \w I|strong="H6258"\w* speak, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* pain \w will|strong="H3605"\w* not rest: \w and|strong="H8074"\w* if \w I|strong="H6258"\w* hold \w my|strong="H3605"\w* peace, \w it|strong="H8074"\w* \w will|strong="H3605"\w* not depart \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H8074"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* sorrow hath oppressed \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* all \w my|strong="H1961"\w* limbs \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* nothing.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* wrinkles \w bear|strong="H7852"\w* \w witness|strong="H5869"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* false speaker riseth \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H0639"\w*, contradicting \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* hath gathered \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* fury \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* threatening \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath gnashed \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* teeth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w my|strong="H5921"\w* enemy hath beheld \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* terrible eyes.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* opened \w their|strong="H5921"\w* mouths \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* reproaching \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* struck \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cheek, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* filled \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* pains.

God hath shut \w me|strong="H0270"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* unjust man, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* hath delivered \w me|strong="H0270"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* hands \w of|strong="H0270"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* wicked.

\w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* formerly \w so|strong="H3808"\w* wealthy, am \w all|strong="H5437"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* sudden broken \w to|strong="H5921"\w* pieces: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w taken|strong="H5437"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* neck, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath broken \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* hath \w set|strong="H5437"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* mark.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* hath compassed \w me|strong="H6440"\w* round \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* lances, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath wounded \w my|strong="H5921"\w* loins, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath not spared, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* hath poured \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bowels \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* hath torn \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* wound \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* wound, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* hath rushed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H7161"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* giant.

\w I|strong="H4480"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* sowed sackcloth \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* skin, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* covered \w my|strong="H5921"\w* flesh \w with|strong="H5921"\w* ashes.
\w My|strong="H5921"\w* face \w is|strong="H3709"\w* swollen \w with|strong="H5921"\w* weeping, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* eyelids \w are|strong="H3808"\w* dim.

These \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* suffered \w without|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* hand, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* offered pure prayers \w to|strong="H1961"\w* God.

O \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*, cover \w not|strong="H1571"\w* thou \w my|strong="H6258"\w* blood, \w neither|strong="H1571"\w* \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w my|strong="H6258"\w* cry find \w a|strong="H1571"\w* hiding place \w in|strong="H1571"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* behold \w my|strong="H0413"\w* \w witness|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* he \w that|strong="H5869"\w* knoweth \w my|strong="H0413"\w* conscience \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* high.

\w My|strong="H3198"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* full \w of|strong="H1121"\w* words: \w my|strong="H3198"\w* eye poureth out tears \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* O \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* man might \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* son \w of|strong="H8141"\w* man \w is|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* companion!
For behold short years pass away and I am walking in a path by which I shall not return.
